title: Jock Blackwood
text:
John Garven "Jock" Blackwood (26 August 1899 – c. 1979) was a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who represented <a href="Australia">Australia</a>.
Blackwood, a <a href="Hooker%20%28rugby%20union%29">hooker</a>, was born in <a href="Mona%20Vale%2C%20New%20South%20Wales">Mona Vale, New South Wales</a> and claimed a total of 21 international rugby caps for Australia. He was inducted into the Australian Rugby Union's Hall of Fame in 2015.
